nl.naturalis.nda.export.dwca

Class ExportDwCAUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.nda.export.dwca.ExportDwCAUtilities

  • public class ExportDwCAUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

    ExportDwCAUtilities

    Description: String Utilites for the StringBuilder Class to Write data to a CSV file

    Different method used in the DwCAExporter tool

    Since:
    12-02-2015
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Reinier.Kartowikromo

      • addToZipFile

        public static void addToZipFile(java.lang.String fileName,
                                java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zos)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException
        Zip multiple files
        Parameters:
        fileName - set filename
        zos - Class Zos
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - File exception
        java.io.IOException - IO exception

        Example: String zipfilename = zipFileName + zipExtension; try ( FileOutputStream fos = new FileOutputStream(zipfilename); ZipOutputStream zos = new ZipOutputStream(fos)) { StringUtilities.addToZipFile(FILE_NAME_META, zos); StringUtilities.addToZipFile(FILE_NAME_EML, zos); StringUtilities.addToZipFile(csvOutPutFile, zos); } System.out.println("Zipfile '" + zipfilename + * "' created successful.");
